scripts.dev: op run --env-file=.env.template -- bun run dev:backend & op run --env-file=.env.template -- bun run dev:frontend
scripts.build: bun run build:frontend && bun run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Backend build will use Docker in Story 1.8'
scripts.test: bun run test:frontend && bun run test:backend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: uv run --project my_flow_api ruff check my_flow_api/src/
scripts.format: bun run format:frontend && bun run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: uv run --project my_flow_api ruff format my_flow_api/src/
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:frontend && bun run typecheck:backend
